title: Mark Hughes: How McLaren could have won in Singapore â€” if its drivers weren't fighting
summary: When Lando Norris pitted to avoid being overtaken by Oscar Piastri at the Singapore Grand Prix, he closed off the strategy that could have won him the F1 race; one that was proven by Lewis Hamilton back in 2014

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri drive for during the Singapore Grand Prix?
In which year did Lewis Hamilton showcase a winning strategy at the Singapore Grand Prix?
What was the consequence of Lando Norris pitting during the race?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It closed off the strategy that could have won him the race.
wrong_options: He gained track position over Piastri.
